description: Implement real content for 4 stub dashboard pages: my-team, news, draft, and next-task
goal: Replace placeholder 'coming soon' pages with functional UI that displays real data from existing stores and generators
requirements: my-team page: Display team stats, roster overview, stadium info, division standings
news page: Show generated league events, transactions, injuries, milestones
draft page: Display draft prospects, scouting reports, draft order, pick interface
next-task page: Show contextual next action based on game state (play game, sign FA, advance week)
constraints: Use existing data stores (dev-player-store, career-store, schedule-store)
Follow existing UI patterns from completed pages (stats, facilities, staff)
No new API endpoints - use client-side data
